locations.name: Tavern Bedroom
locations.desc: You walk into the bedroom. It is decorated simply with a straw bed and and a dresser at the far end
locations.desc1: You walk into the bedroom. It is decorated simply with a straw bed and and a dresser at the far end. The Dresser has been pushed to the side, revealing a small passage

onPush.desc: You push the dresser out of the way revealing a small hidden passage

Look.desc: there are scuff marks from where the dresser has been moved

Search.desc: A key is stuck in the spine of the Book

Key.name: Rusty Old Key
Key.desc: Rusty old key. There used to be engravings along its length

Look.desc: there are scuff marks from where the dresser has been moved

locations.name: Secret Room
locations.desc: You crawl through the hidden passage and find another room filled with many cats

Attack.desc: the cat hisses at you and dodges away
